content: प्रसाधक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (धिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Accomplishing, or perfecting. {@--2@} Purifying, cleansing. {@--3@} Decorating, ornamenting. --कः A valet-de-chambre, an attendant who dresses his master; <ls>R. 17. 22.</ls>
प्रसाधिका {@--1@} A lady's maid, a female attendant who looks to the toilet of her mistress; प्रसधिकालंबितमग्रपादमाक्षिप्य <ls>R. 7. 7.</ls> {@--2@} Wild rice.
